title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.3 - SERA; board; chairperson
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.3 - SERA; board; chairperson

State Regulations

The term
SERA, as used herein, shall
mean the New York State Employment Relations Act, and the terms
board
and
chairperson
or
chair
shall mean the New York State Public Employment

Relations Board and the chairperson thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.3

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
